## handleLinkPressFeature variable

This feature allows to intercept clicks on anchors (`<a>`<!-- -->). By default, it will prevent the click from propagating. But you can disable this option.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
handleLinkPressFeature: EventFeatureOf<LinkPressOptions, 'onDOMLinkPress', LinkPressTarget>
```
